live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.
Technicians have been dispatched to resolve this issue as soon as possible.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
30032.summary: Some customers in the Braeside area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
30032.title: Dec 4 - Calgary (Braeside) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
